pkgmetadata.longdescription: `japanmap` is a package for Japanese map.:: import matplotlib.pyplot as plt from japanmap import picture, get_data, pref_map pct = picture({'北海道': 'blue'}) # numpy.ndarray # pct = picture({1: 'blue'}) # same to above plt.imshow(pct) # show graphics plt.savefig('map.png') # save to PNG file svg = pref_map(range(1,48), qpqo=get_data()) # IPython.display.SVG print(svg.data) # SVG sourceRequirements------------* Python 3.10, Pillow, Numpy, Open-CVFeatures--------* nothingSetup-----:: $ pip install japanmapHistory-------0.0.1 (2016-6-7)~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~* first release
